statements: SELECT * FROM budget_allocation;
SELECT program_name, allocated_amount FROM budget_allocation;
SELECT program_name, allocated_amount FROM budget_allocation WHERE program_code = 12345;
SELECT program_name, allocated_amount FROM budget_allocation WHERE allocated_amount > 1000;
SELECT program_name, allocated_amount FROM budget_allocation ORDER BY allocated_amount DESC;
SELECT program_name, allocated_amount FROM budget_allocation WHERE program_code = 101 ORDER BY allocated_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM budget_allocation WHERE allocation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT program_name, SUM(allocated_amount) AS total_allocation FROM budget_allocation GROUP BY program_name ORDER BY total_allocation DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_code, allocated_amount FROM budget_allocation WHERE allocated_amount > 5000 ORDER BY program_name ASC, allocated_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT program_code FROM budget_allocation ORDER BY program_code;
SELECT program_id, program_name, budget_amount FROM budget_allocation;
SELECT program_name, program_id, budget_amount FROM budget_allocation;
SELECT budget_amount, program_name, program_id FROM budget_allocation;
SELECT * FROM budget_allocation;
SELECT expense_id, program_id, expense_category, expense_amount FROM program_expenses;
SELECT program_name, budget_amount FROM budget_allocation WHERE budget_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM budget_allocation WHERE program_id = 3
SELECT program_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expense FROM budget_allocation b JOIN program_expenses e ON b.program_id = e.program_id GROUP BY b.program_name
SELECT program_name, expense_category, expense_amount FROM budget_allocation b JOIN program_expenses e ON b.program_id = e.program_id WHERE budget_amount > 10000 AND expense_amount > 500
SELECT program_name, expense_category, expense_amount FROM budget_allocation b LEFT JOIN program_expenses e ON b.program_id = e.program_id WHERE e.program_id IS NULL
SELECT * FROM legislative_programs;
SELECT program_name, budget FROM legislative_programs ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT program_name, budget FROM legislative_programs WHERE budget > 50000;
SELECT * FROM budget_changes WHERE change_amount < 0;
SELECT program_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM program_expenses GROUP BY program_id ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_programs;
SELECT program_name, budget FROM legislative_programs WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT program_name, SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM legislative_programs GROUP BY program_name;

SELECT program_name, expense_description, expense_date, expense_amount FROM legislative_programs JOIN program_expenses ON legislative_programs.program_id = program_expenses.program_id WHERE expense_amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date ASC;

SELECT program_name, change_amount, change_date FROM legislative_programs JOIN budget_changes ON legislative_programs.program_id = budget_changes.program_id WHERE change_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM budget_allocation;
SELECT program_name, budget_amount FROM budget_allocation WHERE budget_amount > 1000;
SELECT program_name, budget_amount FROM budget_allocation ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;

SELECT program_name, department_name, amount_spent FROM budget_allocation JOIN transaction ON budget_allocation.program_id = transaction.program_id JOIN department ON transaction.department_id = department.department_id;

SELECT program_name, department_name, amount_spent FROM budget_allocation JOIN program_department ON budget_allocation.program_id = program_department.program_id JOIN department ON program_department.department_id = department.department_id;
SELECT program_name, budget_amount FROM budget_allocation WHERE budget_amount > 5000 ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;

SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) AS program_count FROM department JOIN program_department ON department.department_id = program_department.department_id GROUP BY department_name ORDER BY program_count DESC;
SELECT program_name, SUM(amount_spent) AS total_spent FROM budget_allocation JOIN transaction ON budget_allocation.program_id = transaction.program_id GROUP BY program_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;

SELECT program_name, department_name, amount_spent FROM budget_allocation JOIN transaction ON budget_allocation.program_id = transaction.program_id JOIN department ON transaction.department_id = department.department_id WHERE amount_spent > 1000 ORDER BY amount_spent DESC;

SELECT department.department_name, AVG(budget_amount) AS avg_budget FROM department JOIN program_department ON department.department_id = program_department.department_id JOIN budget_allocation ON program_department.program_id = budget_allocation.program_id GROUP BY department.department_name ORDER BY avg_budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM legislative_programs;
SELECT program_name, budget_amount FROM legislative_programs ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT program_name, budget_amount FROM legislative_programs WHERE budget_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM budget_allocation WHERE allocated_amount < 5000 ORDER BY allocated_amount ASC;
SELECT program_name, category_name FROM program_categories JOIN budget_categories ON program_categories.category_id = budget_categories.category_id;
SELECT * FROM legislative_programs;
SELECT program_name, budget_amount FROM legislative_programs WHERE budget_amount > 100000;
SELECT p.program_id, p.program_name, b.allocated_amount FROM legislative_programs p JOIN budget_allocation b ON p.program_id = b.program_id;
SELECT pc.program_id, bc.category_name FROM program_categories pc JOIN budget_categories bc ON pc.category_id = bc.category_id;
SELECT pe.program_id, pe.expenditure_amount, pe.expenditure_date FROM program_expenditures pe WHERE pe.expenditure_amount < 50000 ORDER BY pe.expenditure_date DESC;
